name: Try not to break it!
description:
Try not to break it!

You are Thief named Tony. Your task is to pick locks on safes and doors. As a pacifist, you believe that stealing stuff (burglary) is better than robbery. But be careful not to break your lockpick before you get your loot - otherwise it will disappear!

Use space or click on Tony to pick the lock. Good luck!

Credits:

  • Art: Luneł
  • Code: Albert 'aweczet' Jendrzejczak
